Warning:
Fauna is decommissioning FQL v4 on June 30, 2025.

This driver is not compatible with FQL v10, the latest version. Fauna accounts created after August 21, 2024 must use FQL v10.
Ensure you migrate existing projects to the official v10 driver by the v4 EOL date: https://github.com/fauna/fauna-jvm.

For more information, see the v4 end of life (EOL) announcement and related FAQ.

com.faunadb.client.query

Class Language.Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faunadb.client.query.Language.Path
  • Enclosing class:
    Language

    public static final class Language.Path
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for path selectors. This builder must be constructed using either the at(String...) or at(int...) functions.
    See Also:
    FaunaDB Miscellaneous Functions, Language.Contains(Path, Expr), Language.Select(Path, Expr), Language.Select(Path, Expr, Expr), Language.SelectAll(Path, Expr)
